base_description: Silver faucet set with modern design.
part_description: Includes one curved spout and two handles; spout centered, handles on each side.
internal_interaction_description: The handles control the flow of water through the spout. Turning the handles adjusts the internal valves, allowing water to flow through the spout when open. The curved spout directs water downward into a sink, with the handles positioned for easy access and operation.
external_interaction_description: The faucet set is installed on a sink or countertop. Users interact by turning the handles to adjust water flow and temperature. It connects to plumbing for water supply and is designed for residential or commercial bathroom or kitchen use.
